S

saveImageFile(PhotoCache, String, int, PhotoCacheDataSource.OnImageFileSavedListener) - Static method in class com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources.PhotoCacheDataSource
Async method that receive listener as a parameter and write the image file on the storage, with the specified path, name, format and quality, and then call one of the listener method (onSaved(PhotoCache), onAlreadySaved(PhotoCache), onSavingFailed(IOException) depends on the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread.
saveImageFileSync(String, String, Bitmap.CompressFormat, Bitmap, int) - Static method in class com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources.PhotoCacheDataSource
Method that write a Bitmap object to an image file in the storage, (external memory)

ScrollZoomedPhotosActivity - Class in com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.activities
ScrollZoomedPhotosFragment, it's much optimized, more safe for using.
ScrollZoomedPhotosActivity() - Constructor for class com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.activities.ScrollZoomedPhotosActivity
 
ScrollZoomedPhotosFragment - Class in com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.fragments
Responsible to show the local downloaded photos in fullscreen mode with zoom option in a recycler view, this fragment is hold listener object and notify him when the the user scroll the photos in fullscreen mode, the listener is attached after the creation, in other words, the activity that maintain this fragment must implement this interface, the interface is ScrollZoomedPhotosFragment.OnScrollZoomedPhotosListener, if NOT we throw RuntimeException.
ScrollZoomedPhotosFragment() - Constructor for class com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.fragments.ScrollZoomedPhotosFragment
Must default constructor
ScrollZoomedPhotosFragment.OnScrollZoomedPhotosListener - Interface in com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.fragments
This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.
SEARCH_POSITION - Static variable in class com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.fragments.adapters.ListFragmentPagerAdapter
Latest Fragment position in the Pager Adapter
SEARCH_TEMPLATE - Static variable in class com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources.ThumbPhotoDataSource

startScrollZoomedPhotosFragment(int) - Method in class com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.fragments.DownloadedFragment
When press a local photo in (LocalPhotosAdapter), we show that photo in fullscreen mode with zoom option, and you can scroll between the zoomed photos while keep the scrolling synced between the to lists (recyclers view).
